name: pwa-complete-guide
description: A complete guide to PWAs. Building a simple Instagram clone.

scripts.minify: uglifyjs public/src/js/app.js -o public/src/js/app.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs public/src/js/feed.js -o public/src/js/feed.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run inject-manifest-sw
